alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Harnett; Lee; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 12:30PM EDT until September 09 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Harnett County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Lee County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Wake County in central North Carolina... Eastern Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1229 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Fuquay-Varina, or 12 miles northeast of Sanford, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Cary, Pittsboro, Fuquay-Varina, Apex, Holly Springs, Morrisville, Broadway, Crosswinds Boating Center and Crosswinds Campground. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
